authors: Martin Rowe, James Wilson, Lincoln Lavoie, University Of New Hampshire Interoperability Lab
maintext: Flexibility in network control and distribution has created the need for separating the functions between wireless and wired network equipment. To deliver on the promise of 5G, which sometimes seems like everything to everyone, network operators will need to augment their existing network architectures, addressing some flexibility brought into existence with the new 5G technologies…
title: 5G Technology World
title_page: Wireline Archives - Page 4 of 4 - 5G Technology World
